# Tashna Eyewear

> Premium Frames, Sunglasses & Contact Lenses in Pakistan.

## Website Overview
Tashna Eyewear is a premium eyewear brand based in Pakistan, offering a wide range of stylish frames, sunglasses, blue-cut protection glasses, and contact lenses. We provide expert lens customization and fast delivery across the country.

## Core Offerings
- **Eyeglasses:** Prescription frames for men, women, and kids.
- **Sunglasses:** Trendy sunglasses with UV protection.
- **Contact Lenses:** Colored and prescription contact lenses.
- **Blue Cut Lenses:** Protection against digital eye strain.

## Navigation Structure
- [Home](/) - The main landing page featuring new arrivals and best sellers.
- [Shop](/shop) - Browse our complete collection of eyewear.
- [Contact Us](/contact-us) - Get in touch with our support team.
- [About Us](/about-us) - Learn about our mission and values.
- [FAQ](/faq) - Frequently asked questions about prescriptions, shipping, and returns.
- [Shipping Policy](/shipping-policy) - Information on shipping rates and times.
- [Returns & Exchanges](/returns-exchanges) - Our 30-day return policy details.

## Technical Details
- **Platform:** React / Vite
- **Shipping:** Free shipping on orders over specific amount (check site).
- **Returns:** 30-day return policy.

- Computer Glasses (Blue Cut)

## Contact Information
- Email: support@tashnaeyewear.com
